tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_data (
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    engagement_score INT,
    sentiment_score INT,
    brand_mentions INT
);

CREATE TABLE SocialMediaPosts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerSentiments (
    sentiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_data (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  email_address VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  social_media_handles JSON
)

CREATE TABLE engagement_data (
  engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  engagement_date TIMESTAMP,
  engagement_type VARCHAR(20),
  engagement_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis (
  sentiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  sentiment_score FLOAT,
  sentiment_category VARCHAR(20),
  analysis_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE brand_engagement (
  engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  brand_id INT,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
  hashtag VARCHAR(50),
  engagement_level VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    post_text TEXT,
    post_date DATE,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date DATE
);
